info.name: MCC CO2 Clock
info.summary: Displays a CO2 budget clock on the Nextcloud login page
info.description:
Displays a clock showing the remaining global CO2 budget (and the time we will have used it up at the current rate) on the Nextcloud login pages of Nextcloud itself and password protected shared links.
Source for the clock: [mcc-berlin.net](https://www.mcc-berlin.net/en/research/co2-budget.html)
info.author: Tobias K
